content: *in the picture shelley is the doll on the left bryan is the doll on the right lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60658 skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 3 colors 1 ball each a b c plus d tiffanytm article #260 *discontinued* 137 yards *shown in fisherman azalea pink denim tiffany camel* *materials are sufficient to make several dolls * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers polyester fiberfill 2 black buttons 9 mm diameter or scrap of black felt brown embroidery floss and embroidery needle powdered blush cotton swab sewing needle and thread pieces doll body hat scarf pants and dress are worked as part of the body some construction required to finish see also 60680 amigurumi bryan boy doll 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-bryan-boy-doll
